channel.title: CVE Feed for Tempesta -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tempesta -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2758|2024-08-01T19:25:41.425Z -- tempesta -- tempesta%20fw
item.description: Tempesta FW rate limits are not enabled by default. They are either set too large to capture empty CONTINUATION frames attacks or too small to handle normal HTTP requests appropriately.

item.title: CVE-2024-2758|2024-06-04T17:29:35.250Z -- tempesta -- tempesta%20fw
item.description: Tempesta FW rate limits are not enabled by default. They are either set too large to capture empty CONTINUATION frames attacks or too small to handle normal HTTP requests appropriately.
